sect2.title: Installation of OpenSSL
sect2.para: Install OpenSSL by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../openssl-0.9.7c-manpages.patch sed 's/^passwd/openssl-passwd/' doc/apps/passwd.pod \ > doc/apps/openssl-passwd.pod && rm doc/apps/passwd.pod && ./config --openssldir=/etc/ssl --prefix=/usr shared && make MANDIR=/usr/share/man && make MANDIR=/usr/share/man install && rmdir /etc/ssl/lib chmod 755 /usr/lib/pkgconfig
